title: The Ideas Spectrum at the Festival of Ideas
description:
Join us for an informal, entertaining and stimulating celebration of diversity within the arts, humanities and social sciences. This is your chance to hear from Cambridge’s LGBT+ researchers as they talk about their work and their experiences of being out in academia.

The event is free, but to book your place visit https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/the-ideas-spectrum-tickets-50487528557

The event will be taking place in the Wine Bar
